data.name: Syltherine
data.longerDescription: Modern minimalist white dining chair. Crisp white finish with tapered wood legs. Perfect for dining rooms, kitchens, breakfast nooks and more!

data.name: Leviosa
data.longerDescription: Crisp white finish with tapered wood legs. Perfect for cafes, restaurants, and more!

data.name: Lolito
data.longerDescription: Spacious design, perfect for lounging or big gatherings. Premium materials. Unparalleled comfort, ideal for movie nights or entertaining.

data.name: Respira
data.longerDescription: Enjoy drinks and conversation under the sun with this stylish outdoor bar table and stool set. Perfect for entertaining or relaxing in your backyard, patio, or balcony.

data.name: Grifo
data.longerDescription: Provides calming light for a restful sleep. Perfect for bedrooms & nurseries.

data.name: Pingky
data.longerDescription: Turn your bed into a cozy haven with this cute bed set. Perfect for adding a touch of whimsy to your bedroom.

data.name: Potty
data.longerDescription: Clean lines, simple design. This minimalist flower pot elevates your greenery without stealing the show. Perfect for modern spaces and a variety of plants.
